function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to inadequate surveillance and control measures","Impact":"Spread of disease, increased morbidity and mortality","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced surveillance and tracking systems, enforcing quarantine measures, and providing real-time updates to the public","Technologies":"Big data analytics, AI, mobile-phone location tracking, real-time alert systems","People":"Citizens, travelers, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns and ethical implications of using big data and location tracking","Impact":"Violation of privacy rights, public distrust, and ethical controversies","Mitigation":"Implementing strict data privacy regulations, transparency in data usage, obtaining informed consent, and anonymizing personal information","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques, consent management systems","People":"Citizens, travelers, technology companies, government","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, technology companies, government"},{"Description":"Dependence on technology for disease control and surveillance","Impact":"Risk of system failure, cybersecurity threats, and data breaches","Mitigation":"Regular testing and maintenance of technology systems, implementing robust cybersecurity measures, and data encryption","Technologies":"Cybersecurity tools, data encryption, regular system maintenance","People":"Citizens, travelers, healthcare workers, technology experts","Owner":"Technology companies, government, cybersecurity experts"}]}
